General.Name: Comanche International Public Company Limited
General.Description: Comanche International Public Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, provides information technology solutions for hotels and serviced apartments. It offers property management system, a set of software solutions, including front-office system, point of sales, back-office system, inventory control, event management system, and interface, as well as mobility modules, and hardware equipment and peripherals. The company sells computers and computer software, as well as provides maintenance services and other services relating to computer software. It operates in the United States, Thailand, Myanmar, Vietnam, Laos, Australia, Cambodia, Hong Kong, Macau, China, Japan, Indonesia, the Philippines, Maldives, Malaysia, Taiwan, India, Sri Lanka, and Singapore. The company was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.

4.Name: Mr. Pirom  Methaveerapong
4.Title: Chief Marketing Officer, Head of Bus. Devel. Thailand & CLMV
